item.title: Preventing Pre-Bootstrap Prometheus Alerts
item.description: The up time series in Prometheus is incredibly useful for monitoring the availability of your targets at a high level. In its most basic form, alerting on the health of your targets looks like this: alert: InstanceDown expr: up == 0 for: 5m labels: - severity: page annotations: - summary: "Instance {{$labels.instance}} down" - description: "{{$labels.instance}} of job {{$labels.job}} has been down for more than 5 minutes." This alert will fire after Prometheus has been unable to scrape a target for 5 minutes straight.
